Package org.jboss.windup.rules.files

Class FileMapping

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.windup.config.GraphRule
      • org.jboss.windup.rules.files.FileMapping
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PreRulesetEvaluation, FileMappingFrom, FileMappingTo, FileMappingWithID, org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.Condition, org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.Operation, org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.Rule, org.ocpsoft.rewrite.context.Context
    public class FileMapping
extends GraphRule
implements PreRulesetEvaluation, FileMappingFrom, FileMappingTo, FileMappingWithID
    Maps file extensions to WindupVertexFrame types. Mappings are always applied during the ArchiveMetadataExtractionPhase phase, no matter where this rule appears in the pipeline. The following example demonstrates how to match files ending with *.xml to a frame type: 
       FileMapping.from(".*\\.xml").to(XmlFileModel.class)
    Author:
    Lincoln Baxter, III
